ai-mil7.4.5:1.1_0: “Venerable sir, what are the five factors of a dragon?”
ai-mil7.4.5:1.2_0: “Great king, from mountain torments, unshakable, unclouded, and unshakable,
ai-mil7.4.5:1.3_0: In the same way, great king, one who lives in a wilderness region carrying yourselves around on all sides, you should not be heedless, unhappy in all kinds of fame, praised by scattering, and unformed. ...
ai-mil7.4.5:1.4_0: This is the first kind of mountain.
ai-mil7.4.5:1.5_0: The Buddha has spoken about the gods of the Thirty-Three:
ai-mil7.4.5:3.1_0: Furthermore, great king, from mountain torments is mixed with some kind of state.
ai-mil7.4.5:3.2_0: In the same way, there are those who mixed with laypeople and renunciates. You should not be mixed with some business.
ai-mil7.4.5:3.3_0: this is the second great king.
ai-mil7.4.5:3.4_0: The Buddha has spoken about the gods of the Thirty-Three:
ai-mil7.4.5:4.1_0: “I have seen the bones of the household life,
ai-mil7.4.5:4.3_0: A migrant without a shelter, few in wishes:
ai-mil7.4.5:4.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.’
ai-mil7.4.5:5.1_0: Furthermore, a mountain cleft isn’t found.
ai-mil7.4.5:5.2_0: In the same way, the meditator’s own master should not be tired from the opposite only.
ai-mil7.4.5:5.3_0: this, great king, is the third of a mountain.
ai-mil7.4.5:5.4_0: The senior monk to hear it.
ai-mil7.4.5:6.1_0: ‘With sensual desire for rebirth in the realm of luminous mind,
ai-mil7.4.5:7.1_0: Having dyed the dust and dirt,
ai-mil7.4.5:7.4_0: I depart, having gone out, your control.
ai-mil7.4.5:8.1_0: this is the purity for purity.
ai-mil7.4.5:9.1_0: Furthermore, great king, has gone beyond the mountain,
ai-mil7.4.5:9.2_0: In the same way, a meditator should use the consequence of contempt.
ai-mil7.4.5:9.3_0: this, great king, is the fourth, a fourfold army.
ai-mil7.4.5:9.4_0: The Buddha has spoken about the gods of the Thirty-Three:
ai-mil7.4.5:10.4_0: sorrowless, they behold this generation of sorrow,
ai-mil7.4.5:10.5_0: as a wise man on a mountain-top
ai-mil7.4.5:11.1_0: Furthermore, great king, from the mountain top downwards,
ai-mil7.4.5:11.2_0: In the same way, when you roam out of yourselves in the shade of the roams,
ai-mil7.4.5:11.4_0: The laywoman named Cūḷapanthaka of the Sakyans,
ai-mil7.4.5:12.2_0: But one who is bent down by one:
ai-mil7.4.5:13.1_0: The fifth enquiry is the fifth thing.
